# ChangeLog

## 1.4.0
* Log warning for 404 status code, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3188

## 1.3.0
* Exposed body for getSecret method, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3188

## 1.2.0
* Added set and get acls functionality

## 1.1.1
* Added sandbox end point(dummy, as there is no sandbox env, to avoid security alerts for sandbox -> Prod calls)
* Swictched endpoint for whitelist to spellcaster https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2211

## v1.1.0
* Added create and delete secret functionality

## v1.0.5
* Removed explicitly defined discovery instrument

## v1.0.4
* Added urn for service-discovery

## v1.0.3
* Increased timeouts for Prod/staging/DEV

## v1.0.1
* Added API `isAppWhiteListed` for checking app whitelist in fidelius config.

## v1.0.0
* Initial Version
